mapper.select: SELECT a.id, u.id AS u_id, u.avatarUrl AS u_avatarUrl, u.nickname AS u_nickname, a.boardId, a.userId, a.title, a.createTime, a.visitCount, a.likeCount, a.replyCount, a.state FROM t_article a JOIN t_user u ON a.userId = u.id WHERE a.deleteState = 0 ORDER BY a.createTime DESC

SELECT a.id, u.id AS u_id, u.avatarUrl AS u_avatarUrl, u.nickname AS u_nickname, a.boardId, a.userId, a.title, a.createTime, a.visitCount, a.likeCount, a.replyCount, a.state FROM t_article a JOIN t_user u ON a.userId = u.id WHERE a.deleteState = 0 AND boardId = #{boardId, jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY a.createTime DESC
